message.content: {"id": "11863", "title": "Bug 11863 - Update Test Suite action does not allow removal", "description": "", "OB": "When selecting 'Y' in the dialog for the Update Test Suite action, it is not clear that this will result in the removal of X. The behavior should be improved to clearly indicate that selecting 'Y' will remove X.", "EB": "The 'Update' action should display the content of the existing Test Suite (directory, zip file) and allow modifications. Renaming the action and the dialog to 'Recreate Test Suite' would provide a clearer solution to the problem.", "SR": "Improve the behavior of the Update Test Suite action to clearly indicate that selecting 'Y' will remove X. Rename the action and the dialog to 'Recreate Test Suite'."}

origin.input_prompt:
Your role is a senior software engineer, you are very good at analyzing and writing bug reports.
It is possible that the bug report may lack sufficient details in the OB, EB, and SR sections.  In such cases, your task is to infer the appropriate details based on the context and supplement the bug report to ensure it contains clear and complete OB/EB/SR statements.  Also, improve the wording of these statements for clarity where possible.
To facilitate this process, please provide your responses in JSON format as follows:
{"id": "", "title": "", "description": "", "OB": "", "EB": "", "SR": ""}
origin.input_content:
<BUG REPORT>
